Sprint: 1. Conversion rate: 1 story point = 4-6 hours depending on complexity
2. UX hours include design, prototyping, and design reviews
3. FE hours include component development, styling, and integration
4. BE hours include API development, database work, and integrations
5. PM hours include testing, documentation, and stakeholder communication
6. TL hours include architecture, code reviews, and infrastructure setup
7. Some overlap exists between roles (pair programming, reviews, etc.)
